name: The Zeta Disaster
description:
Follow the story of Captain Tir Malik in the retro space shooter The Zeta Disaster!

While returning to earth after a long space expedition Zeta Squadron is pulled into a dimensional rift and thrown into the far reaches of known existence. Alone and unconscious Captain Malik encounters hostile creates while investigating effects of the rift and attempting to find survivors. The horde of enemies seems endless and merciless. There is no time for regret, fly fast and take chances.

Xbox controller or game-pad is recommended for best game play.

There will be no add-ons of expansions for this game. However, look for official sequels in future.

Thank you for supporting indi game development!
